div.t-attf-class: #{pageName or ''} #{direction == 'rtl' and 'o_rtl' or ''} #{'o_portal' if is_portal else ''}

div.h4:
Hey
You don't have a listing!

ul.li: - Some members won't contact you without a listing
- Member's with listings are twice as likely to receive a reply
- Listings will allow you to receive direct enquiries

form.p: For the security of our community, all members are required to verify their mobile number

div.span: Allowed Verified members to contact me on my mobile(recommended)

button.class: btn btn-green1 mt-3 mb-4 btn-block send_sms_code_btn

div.p: Mobile verification is required to activate listings, message members, access phone numbers or social media profiles
Build trust and increase enquiries by verifying your social media.
A security code has been sent to .It may take a few minutes to arrive.

button.class: btn btn-green1 mt-3 mb-4 btn-block check_otp

div.p:
Haven't received anything? Try again
Do not share security codes with anyone.

form.p: If you deregister your mobile any active listings will be inaccessible to other members until you re-verify your nre number.

button.class: btn btn-green1 mt-3 mb-4 btn-block deregister-mobile

ul.li:
Send messages to
Free to Message
listings

* To qualify for the guarantee you must have one listing on the site during your plan with a photo, but no more than one property listing.
Members who list more than one property do not qualify for this guarantee.
** Access to mobile numbers and social content is not made available by all listing owners. Links to Facebook profiles are temporarily unavailable due to changes in Facebook's privacy policy.

form.p: Invoice is sent to your register Email ID

div.span: Allowed Verified members to contact me on my mobile(recommended)

div.p: We'll send listing alerts when you have an active listing
You will be notified when a new device or browser has accessed your account
You will only receive new mwssage alerts when you have an active listing

Deactivating your account means your listing will be taken down and your listing alerts will be turned off. You can still access your account but it will remain dorment until you reactivate or create a new listing.
Deleting your account means that your account and listing removed from the website.

div.h3: You really want to delete your account

div.t-attf-class: clearfix oe_login_buttons text-center mb-1 {{'pt-2' if form_small else 'pt-3'}}

input.name: name
input.t-att-autofocus: 'autofocus' if login and not only_passwords else None
